title: League of Legends Beta Client Launch issue
body:
I'm having an issue with League where I try to launch the game via the beta client and get this error:

"League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha
client to try again."

Has anyone encountered this or maybe have a fix for it ? Any advice or comment is appreciated.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I've seen this error quite a few times here on *H&S*. This error will usually pop up if something went horribly wrong during either the patching or Client upgrade process. You may be able to resolve this by deleting the **LeagueClient.exe** file inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and then launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*).

Please let me know if this caused any change!
It worked !! Thank you so much, hopefully others with this problem will see this !{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Also sorry for the late reply haha
